title: Hour 1 – Covino and Rich Guest Host
itunes:title: Hour 1 – Covino and Rich Guest Host
description:
Covino and Rich fill in for Dan Patrick and the crew. They start out the show by trying to figure out why the Yankees have been playing bad baseball. Covino shares a request his daughter made.  Aaron Rodgers is not happy, again. Then, the guys react to some early morning tweets from Antonio Brown.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
